metadata.title: CVE-2019-17673 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
WordPress before 5.2.4 is vulnerable to poisoning of the cache of JSON GETrequests because certain requests lack a Vary: Origin header.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-17673` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 5.2.4+dfsg1-1
wordpress-l10n - 5.2.4+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentyfour - 5.2.4+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentythree - 5.2.4+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentytwo - 5.2.4+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.2.4+dfsg1-1').
